function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Existing HVAC systems not designed for high filtration pressure levels","Impact":"Inability to control virus particles in the built environment, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting extensive retrofits to HVAC systems to meet filtration standards","Technologies":"High-efficiency filtration systems, HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants, especially in public spaces like schools","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Debate at institutional levels regarding HVAC system upgrades","Impact":"Delayed implementation of necessary filtration upgrades and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Facilitating informed discussions and decision-making processes at the institutional level","Technologies":"Collaborative decision-making tools, expert consultations","People":"Institutional leaders, facility managers, public health experts","Owner":"Institutional leadership, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Pressure to upgrade mechanical systems in public schools","Impact":"Potential delay in students' return to the classroom and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Prioritizing and providing resources for necessary mechanical system upgrades","Technologies":"Funding allocation, project management tools","People":"Students, teachers, school staff, and parents","Owner":"Government authorities, school administration, and community stakeholders"}]}
